name: Order
description: Part of a modern version of the Gravel piece. As the inital piece displays both order and discipline, I decided to split these into two. This first piece resembles the order side of generative art. Pieces move smoothly, non chaotically between the canvas.

name: Disorder
description: Part of a modern version of the Gravel piece. As the inital piece displays both order and discipline, I decided to split these into two. This second piece resembles the disorder side of generative art. Pieces are chaotically placed between the canvas, having no room to breathe, screaming.

name: Turrell Halo
description: Digital version of an light artwork by one of my favorite artists - James Turrell. Explores light and perception with layered ellipses.

name: Turrell Zoom
description: Digital version of an light artwork by James Turrell, featuring a scrollable zoom element, allowing the user to zoom into the 'light'.

name: Gravel boids
description: Gravel art piece featuring flying boids that fly and light up the background square elements.

name: Star waves
description: Artwork inspired by a visual pattern math and expression puzzles on tixy land.
